'''Superman Skin Pack''' is a [[skin pack]] consisting of 5 skins of characters from the popular ''{{w|Superman}}'' franchise. The skin pack's launch coincided with the release of the {{w|Superman_(2025_film)|2025 Superman movie}}.

== Trivia ==
* In a pop-up prompting the player to get the skin pack, it was teased that there will be a [[Superman DLC]] coming in the near future.<ref name="dlc-leak"> {{citation|url=https://minecraft.wiki/w/File:Superman_Skin_Pack_Notification.jpg|title=Superman|section=|website=|author=[[Oreville Studios]]|date=July 8, 2025|quote=The free Superman Skin Pack has landed in Minecraft! Choose your favorite from five iconic characters and bring some stellar style to your wardrobe. Suit up and stay tuned for the full Superman DLC coming soon!|archive-url=}}</ref> The Superman map then came to the Marketplace on September 8, 2025.
